actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to establish a Directorate for Behavioral and Social Sciences within the National Science Foundation, and for other purposes.
short_title: Behavioral and Social Sciences Directorate Act of 1991

summary.text: Behavioral and Social Sciences Directorate Act of 1991 - Amends the National Science Foundation Act of 1950 to establish within the National Science Foundation a Directorate for Behavioral and Social Sciences. Authorizes the Director of the Foundation to establish additional directorates and divisions within directorates.

titles.title: Behavioral and Social Sciences Directorate Act of 1991
A bill to establish a Directorate for Behavioral and Social Sciences within the National Science Foundation, and for other purposes.
